profile.title: Professional profile
profile.introduction: Curious and passionate Web Developer with {{years}} years of experience in designing and developing web projects. Adept of clean code, I like the code to be clean, optimized and efficient. Reactive, caring and with a strong team spirit, my help is particularly appreciated to solve problems and to take on new challenges.

list.title: Front-end engineer
list.technologies: TypeScript, React, SPFx, D3.js, Gulp, Service Azure
list.context: Web development in SharePoint Online and the MO365 ecosystem.
details: Design, architecture, and development of custom software components (WebParts) in SharePoint to meet the diverse needs of prestigious clients (Thales, Renault, etc).

list.title: Front-end developer
list.context: Development of a diagrammatic process editor in Microsoft SharePoint Online.
details: Design, architecture and development of the process editor component according to specifications.
Modify a process by adding activities of different types.
Management of connections between the activities using Drag & Drop.
Management of business elements linked to these activities (documents, roles, products, etc.) using Drag & Drop.

list.title: Full-Stack developer
list.technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Axios, Material UI, Node, Express.js, SQL, Stripe
list.context: Integration of the new design and new features on the Mémorable automated video editing web application.
details: Redesign of the app according to the new figma mock-ups.
Integration of the paid part of the application with Stripe.
Drag & drop content downloads.
Edit uploaded content by adding text, set the volume and shorten for videos.
Set up automated email reminders at different times in a project.
Generate a printable PDF containing a QR Code to access and participate to a project.
Setting up a file download service.

list.title: Web developer
list.technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node, MongoDB, Redis, Socket.io, Axios, Styled Components, CoffeeScript, Python, Gatsby, PHP, Grav
list.context: Development of an open source chatbot framework, and an ecosystem of applications for chatbots dedicated to customer support and e-commerce.
details: Development and maintenance of an applications ecosystem, including a back office using an API rest, an intelligent chat widget, a dynamic FAQ widget and a server for the widgets.
Deployment of various applications on Heroku and AWS using CI/CD pipelines.
Design and development of Botfuel Dialog, an open source SDK for developing chatbots.
Implementation of the Botfuel Dialog SDK as a web application usable by everyone.
Maintenance and translation of the company's website.
Development of features and maintenance of a chatbot client project.
Development of a proxy allowing the public, secure and unified use of the different APIs of the company.
Development of modules integrating the company customer support solution on Magento, Wordpress and Shopify websites.
